entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.6°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
